name: WORKSHOP (SoulSoph)
description:
Hey Guys!
WORKSHOP IS FINALLY HERE!

Use the WASD keys to go to different doors, press F to use your flashlight, press E while at a door to light up the door, press H to put on the mask (which will refresh your air).

THERE ARE 3 NEW CREATURES: The watcher, The listener, and the Shy Creature...

There are 2 new icons at the bottom right of the screen, the audio one tells you how loud you're being, while the other one tells you when you need to put on the mask (you're running out of oxygen).
